db:info.db:title: TestClass Class
db:info.db:titleabbrev: Test for overloaded signals and slots using overload command

db:abstract.db:para: Test class for overloaded signals and slots.

db:section.db:title: void TestClass::dataChanged(int value)
db:section.db:para: This method takes an integer value. (Tests overload note for methods that aren't signals/slots)

db:section.db:title: void TestClass::dataChanged(const String &value)
db:section.db:para: This method takes a string value.

db:section.db:title: void TestClass::process(int value)
db:section.db:para: Processes an integer value. (Tests overload note for methods that aren't signals/slots)

db:section.db:title: void TestClass::regularFunction(int value)
db:section.db:para: Regular function that takes an integer value.

db:section.db:title: void TestClass::regularFunction(const String &value)
db:section.db:para: Regular function that takes a string value.
